insert into manager_user (username, password, salt, phone, email, email_active, header_url, create_time, login_time, last_login_time, gender, age, status) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{headerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update manager_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email_active = #{emailActive,jdbcType=TINYINT}, header_url = #{headerUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, salt, phone, email, email_active, header_url, create_time, login_time, last_login_time, gender, age, status from manager_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
